questions.q: Will there be a companion app or digital version?
questions.a: Potentially in the future, but not as part of the initial Kickstarter. We're focused on delivering an exceptional physical deck first. If there's significant community interest in a digital companion (for journaling, learning, or virtual readings), we may explore that in a later phase.

questions.q: Are you planning expansion decks or oracle cards?
questions.a:
We're open to community input! Possible future projects could include:

  • Oracle deck exploring aerial arts more abstractly
  • Expanded guidebook with additional spreads and techniques
  • Educational content (courses, workshops, videos)
  • Collaboration decks featuring different aerial disciplines (pole, hoop, rope, etc.)

For now, our energy is devoted to making The Hermetic Flight the best possible tarot deck it can be.

questions.q: How can I connect with other people using this deck?
questions.a:
We're building community spaces where readers can:

  • Share interpretations and insights
  • Post photos of their readings (with consent)
  • Ask questions and get support
  • Connect with other aerial artists and tarot readers
  • Access exclusive content and advanced techniques

Details will be announced during the Kickstarter campaign. Join our newsletter to stay connected.

questions.q: Can I use this deck for professional readings with clients?
questions.a:
Absolutely! The Hermetic Flight is suitable for professional use. The premium quality, clear imagery, and comprehensive guidebook make it excellent for:

  • In-person readings
  • Video chat/online readings
  • Workshop teaching
  • Photography for your marketing materials (with credit)

Professional readers backing at higher tiers will receive multiple decks at reduced pricing.
